    • Constructor Detail

      • CLBufferRegion

        public CLBufferRegion(long struct)
        Creates a CLBufferRegion instance at the specified memory address.

      • CLBufferRegion

        public CLBufferRegion(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a CLBufferRegion instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
